activity.text: @andrewmccalip Have been following your efforts. If #Lk99 really is Pb10-xCux(PbO4)6O, starting from PbSO4 is insane as it will give a mixed phase product with Cu2S, PbS, PbO and Cu metal. replyTo.text: @BenderDrummer @cacouteau @andrewmccalip Turbo pumps are expensive and the blades are fragile. It's common to mess up sealing a quartz tube during synthesis, which then opens the pump to the atmosphere (ie, puts a huge load on the turbo pump) and could trash it.
